title: Jim Jordan on Hunter laptop story: The only thing fake 18 months ago was the news

sentence: Top House Republican Jim Jordan said on Sunday he thinks “something is up” with the MSM’s recent flip-flop on the Hunter Biden laptop story – which was originally branded as Russian disinformation right before the 2020 US election, only to be validated as authentic in recent weeks amid a grand jury investigation into the First Son.
title: “Something Is Up”: Rep. Jim Jordan Suggests Hunter Biden Indictment Could Be Coming

sentence: Washington Examiner [Ohio Congressman Jim Jordan interviewed by Maria Bartiromo on Sunday] “Remember, it started off as, ‘Oh, it wasn’t his laptop.’ Then it was, ‘Well, it was his laptop, but it was Russian disinformation.’ Now it’s, ‘No, it wasn’t Russian disinformation, but Joe had nothing to do with it,'” Jordan said.
author: Dr. Tar
title: Dems Spinning Furiously to Explain Away Biden Corruption

sentence: (TeaParty.org Exclusive) – Top House GOP member Jim Jordan stated over the weekend that he believes “something is up” with the MSM’s flip-flopping concerning the Hunter Biden laptop story, which the radical left all referred to as “Russian disinformation” just before the 2020 presidential election, only to be confirmed to be authentic as a grand jury continues to investigate the youngest son of Joe Biden.
title: ‘Something Is Up’: Top House Republican Suggests Hunter Biden Indictment Could Be Coming
